select TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm, sum(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) as paymentTotal from payment where PYNM_DT between to_date('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD')
AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') order BY yyyymm

SELECT TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm , SUM(FRCS_ORDER_ORDER_AMT) as total FROM FRCS_ORDER WHERE FRCS_ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY yyyymm

select TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm, sum(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) as paymentTotal from payment where PYNM_DT between to_date('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') order BY yyyymm

SELECT TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') AS yyyymm , SUM(FRCS_ORDER_ORDER_AMT) as total FROM FRCS_ORDER WHERE FRCS_ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} and frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(FRCS_ORDER_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY yyyymm

select totalCnt, menu from (select sum(pd.PYNM_CNT) as totalCnt, pd.MENU_NM as menu from PAYMENT p, PAYMENT_DETAIL pd where p.PYNM_NO = pd.PYNM_NO and p.FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} and p.pynm_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2024-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and TO_CHAR(p.pynm_dt, 'yyyy-MM') = #{viewDate} group by pd.MENU_NO, pd.MENU_NM order by totalCnt desc) where rownum <= 5
